root.name: Army Men II
root.description: OverviewArmy Men II (Written as Army Men 2 on the Game Boy Color) was developed by Digital Eclipse (Game Boy Color version) and 3DO (PC version). Army Men II was published by 3DO on both platforms.PC RequirementsWindows 95/98 or Me;Pentium 90 (Min.), Pentium 133 (Rec.);4x CD-ROM drive;16MB RAM (Min.), 32MB (Rec.);1MB DirectX compatible graphics card;DirectX compatible sound card;150MB free hard drive space (Min.).
